title: Monado Recipes
summary: Monado Recipes is a fan-made repository of recipes based on food found in the Xenoblade Chronicles games.
long_summary: Monado Recipes is a fan-made repository of recipes based on food found in the Xenoblade Chronicles games. How do you take fantasy ingredients like "Mookah Flour" and create a "Pan-Fried Tartari"?

gallery.alt: Recipes listed with their name and a picture of the dish
gallery.caption: A list of recipes

gallery.alt: The ingredients list of a fantasy dish called "Acqua Pearl Pazza"
gallery.caption: Want to make Acqua Pearl Pazza?
